entry.title: itch.io (Game) - Pigeon West: Call Of Gun. ISEKAI

ul.p: About the game (Pigeon West: Call of Gun. Isekai*):

ul.li: Description: What if the most dangerous criminal in the entire Wild West ended up in the most typical isekai—and not even as the main character? When the entire Wild West turned against El Diablo, he had no choice but to retreat. As a result of his perfectly calculated actions, El Diablo ends up in another world. But all he cares about is drinking the finest whiskey. However, as always, there will be those who try to come between a man and his true love (whiskey). But not this time, cowboy.

ul.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

ul.p: About the game (Heartless*):

ul.li: Description: Heartless is a short psychological horror game that blurs the line between love and obsession, grief and madness. One year ago, Sarah vanished without a trace. The last place she was seen was Crimson Diner. For months, her husband, Jonathan, searched endlessly for answers until the trail went cold. But now, a letter has arrived. From Sarah. The message is simple: "Come to the diner." This time, he's not leaving without the truth.

ul.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.
